definitions.definition: Small pieces or strips (streamers) of colored paper or other material (metal, plaster, etc) generally thrown about at festive occasions, especially at weddings and in victory celebrations.
Edible Italian sugar-coated almonds , especially those which are used as part of a traditional Italian wedding.

main_definition: Small pieces or strips (streamers) of colored paper or other material (metal, plaster, etc) generally thrown about at festive occasions, especially at weddings and in victory celebrations.
secondary_definitions: ( rare ) Edible Italian sugar-coated almonds , especially those which are used as part of a traditional Italian wedding.
